Marine Hydraulic Power Unit Design

Multiple hydraulic power units have been developed for specific, custom applications. The one shown is a 120 hp marine unit with twin, variable displacement, 6000 psi pumps capable of supporting twin, 50 hp thrusters for a fly-away application.
